Title: Quarantine 2: Terminal
Writer: John Pogue (screenplay), John Erick Dowdle (motion picture "Quarantine"), Drew Dowdle (motion picture "Quarantine"), Jaume Balagueró (motion picture "Rec"), Luiso Berdejo (motion picture "Rec"), Paco Plaza (motion picture "Rec")
Actors: Mercedes Mason, Josh Cooke, Mattie Liptak, Ignacio Serricchio
Plot: A plane is taken over by a mysterious virus. When the plane lands it is placed under quarantine. Now a group of survivors must band together to survive the quarantine.
